body:
Comment 3: 
Can you provide the output of
    go test -ldflags="--v"

That should show how 6l is invoking the external linker.

The problem may be that the -r option being passed to 6l is not being conveyed to the
external linker.  I've never been quite sure how that works on Darwin.
_Labels changed: added **os-macosx**._
